entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 27 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
